thread.title: Spears' attack umbrella is up for auction
thread.title_full: Britney Spears' attack umbrella is up for auction | Daily Mail Online

author: Ross Mcdonagh For Dailymail.com
title: Spears' attack umbrella is up for auction
text:
The umbrella that Britney Spears used to attack a photographer in 2007 is going on sale.
The photographer on the receiving end of the near beating is auctioning the green umbrella on the 10 year anniversary of the infamous incident.
Daniel Ramos told Broadly on Tuesday that he will donate half the proceeds to a charity of Britney's choice, although her rep has yet to indicate what that might be.
For sale: The umbrella used by Britney Spears in the infamous 2007 paparazzi attack is up for auction, it was revealed on Tuesday
The shocking incident unfolded in 2007 - while she was embroiled in a custody battle with ex Kevin Federline - days after the pop icon had shaved her own head in an LA salon.
She was driving through a Mobil gas station in Tarzana in a silver Mercedes with her cousin at the time, and being relentlessly pursued by photographers.
Her cousin Alli Sims begged the photographers to leave her alone, but Britney snapped, leaping out of the car screaming 'f*** you!' and swinging the umbrella like an axe.
Her call: The photographer revealed he will donate half the proceeds to a charity of Britney's choice. Pictured December
She used it to stab Romos' Ford Explorer, cracking the windows and leaving dents in the body, before dropping the umbrella and fleeing.
Britney later apologized via statement on her website, explaining the outburst was down to a character she was auditioning for.
'I apologize to the pap for a stunt that was done 4 months ago regarding an umbrella,' she wrote. 'I was preparing my character for a role in a movie where the husband never plays his part so they switch places accidentally.
Relived: The umbrella incident was most recently played out on Saturday night, during the Lifetime premiere of its biopic Britney Ever After
Snapped: The shocking incident unfolded in 2007 while she was embroiled in a custody battle with ex Kevin Federline
Breakdown: Britney snapped, leaping out of the car screaming 'f*ck you!' and swinging the brolly like an axe
'I take all my roles very seriously and got a little carried away. Unfortunately I didnâ€™t get the part.'
The following year Britney was placed under a 5150 involuntary psychiatric hold; her father Jamie was granted conservatorship, under which she remains to this day.
The umbrella incident was most recently played out on Saturday night, during the Lifetime premiere of its biopic Britney Ever After.
Bald: The incident occurred days after the pop icon had shaved her own head in an LA salon
